submitMessage: The text will be retrieved from the table TR_PROJECT

questionList.label: Type
questionList.hint: Please select one project type (workshop, expert mission or study visit) or in case of multiple events please select series of events

questionList.label: Title
questionList.value: EU Standards of Land Valuation and Taxation: Transition from Fixed/Normative to Market Value

questionList.label: Beneficiary Ministry/Service
questionList.value: State Service of Ukraine for Geodesy, Cartography and Cadastre

questionList.label: Objective of the request
questionList.value: The aim of the expert mission is to receive the best European experience regarding use of market prices for land taxation as well as  familiarize with the procedure of transition from normative to market value (both legislative and procedure)  in order to assess Ukrainian legislative regulation on land taxation in terms of introducing the utilization of market land valuation for taxation of land, to identify possible ways of introducing European experience (selection of the most optimal model of land valuation use for taxation of lands), and to compose a list of appropriate necessary measures.

questionList.label: Objective of the request
questionList.value: The aim of the expert mission is to receive the best European experience regarding use of market prices for land taxation as well as  familiarize with the procedure of transition from normative to market value (both legislative and procedure)  in order to assess Ukrainian legislative regulation on land taxation in terms of introducing the utilization of market land valuation for taxation of land, to identify possible ways of introducing European experience (selection of the most optimal model of land valuation use for taxation of lands), and to compose a list of appropriate necessary measures.
questionList.hint: Please include a list of the workshops, expert missions and study visits that you would like to request within the above-mentioned project and the relevant Chapter/Sub-chapter of EU Legislation cited later. (Participant information will be required later in relation to study visits)

questionList.value: Article 1 (2 (d)), Article 2, Article 55, and CHAPTER 10 (Article 254) of Association Agreement between the European Union and its Member States, of the one part, and Ukraine of the other part

questionList.label: Proposed indicative date of the exchange/event
Main topics/content
questionList.hint: Please list in details the issues you would like to discuss with the Member States expert(s), such as legislation, infrastructure, strategies, training and any other elements of relevance. Please include the aim as well as the expected impact/outcome of the requested assistance

questionList.label: Current situation/justification
questionList.value: State Service of Ukraine for Geodesy, Cartography and Cadastre is the central executive body which implements state policy in survey and mapping activities and in the sphere of land relations and the State Land Cadastre (Statute of the StateGeoCadastre approved by the Resolution of Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine as of January 14 2015  No 15). Normative land valuation is used in Ukraine for calculation of rent prices for land and for tax issues. Normative land valuation is calculated according to the relevant methodology that was prepared by the StateGeoCadastre. But in fact such approach is used only in Post-Soviet countries, whereas EU Member States use market approach to calculate taxation for the land use. The experience of EU Member States that have succeeded in such transition periods is essential for the StateGeoCadastre.
questionList.hint: Please describe briefly the current situation related to the sector of legislation concerned and provide all information that can contribute to the evaluation of your application
